--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
>
> So I have=
n't been involved much for the last 3 months or so.  I've been
> trying to =
catch up in my post reading, but it seems to be a lost
cause since
> I don'=
t have enough time (or concentration).  Could someone help me
out by
> givi=
ng me a summary of what has happened since I've been out?  Last
I read,
> t=
here was stuff going down in relay and the other group was on the
way to
> =
the ark.  My characters were at the fortress but I couldn't get back
into
>=
 the action.  Any help would be much appreciated, because I would like to
>=
 play again!  :D
> 
> Thanks,
>

I will try to give you the br=
oad strokes! :) Airly, please correct me
if I miss anything or misstate any=
thing. I may have gotten some of the
following out of order a bit . .  a lo=
t has happened. But I hope it
helps. 

Feel free to throw any questions at =
me or Airly. 

------------------------

Megatron X was at Relay while Mali=
ce attacked several of us at the
black fortress. With the help of Myrmidon =
and Perceptor Malice was
repelled from the base. Megatron X showed up and s=
aid a few words.
However just as quickly he left leaving us to our own devi=
ces. (IE:
These character's player stopped posting)

While this was happeni=
ng the Maximals chose this time to attack, I
presume in an attempt to gain =
back their captured members, but their
attempt failed and in fact a member =
was captured: Windlord! And much
like his predecessor Rodimus Prime he too =
was corrupted becoming Darkhawk.

Meanwhile, at a lull in the combat betwee=
n the Maximals and the
Pedicons  a huge host of sweeps began attacking both=
 Predicons and
Maximals at Hydras' base, wreaking much havok. 

meanwhile R=
odimus was sent away on some secret mission and Scourge
along with a few sw=
eeps was sent by Cyclonus to track him down.
Scourge tracked Rodimus to an =
old Maximal base from many years ago.
And despite his best efforts Rodimus =
eluded him. 

Meanwhile at the Ark, the minions Cyclonus had reconstructed =
attacked
the Ark, they had managed to arrive there before the Maximal defen=
ders
who were sent there, due to the distraction of Nightrazor. 

The minio=
ns were about to attack when Legacy, (who appears as a black
and red versio=
n of Shockblast) appeared seemingly from inside the ark
and began to defend=
 it. He was able to single-handedly able to defeat
Deepstryke and Phobia, a=
nd held off the others until help arrived in
the form of Lord Elder and the=
 other Maximal defenders. 

It was revealed that Legacy was a temporal guar=
dian and had been sent
back to correct a temporal irregularity that had for=
med. 

It was then that Cyclonus and his host of sweeps arrived, and the
Ma=
ximals and the Predicons had come to an accord to work together to
defeat t=
his minion menace. 

The battle that ensued was huge! Lord Elder, Legacy, G=
rimlock and the
other Maximal defenders held the Ark while Hydras and his c=
rew
attacked from the rear. 

During the battle a black sphere appeared aro=
und the ark for a long
while, inside a spark extractor unit flew attacking =
the occupants
inside, seeking to find a way into the ark. An interesting ef=
fect of
this extractor is that at certain intervals it fired outside the
sp=
here, striking several of the minion lt's. 

However due to the efforts of =
Legacy and Kup, this menace was
ultimately warded off. 

BUT it was the bat=
tle between Cyclonus and Rodimus that turned the
battle. At first it looked=
 as if Cyclonus had the upper hand, but at
the end Rodimus fired some stran=
ge black optic blast that knocked
Cyclonus out, even as he too fell over. S=
trangely this attack seemed
to effect Scourge, who left his post to come to=
 his commander's
defenses. However instead of being thanked Scourge was hit=
 by a
similar blast from Cyclonus and Scourge also fell unconscious. 

With=
out any of the commanders to lead them the sweeps were quickly
routed. 

No=
w the Predicons and Maximals are attempting to pick up the shattered
pieces=
 of thier battle, and make thier own plans for the future. 

Interestingly,=
 the Spark extractor that had attacked the ark has
attacked Myrmidon, KOing=
 him, so far his condition is unknown. The
device is now attacking Hydras, =
as he attempts to get his wounded
forces about of there. 

And as a last no=
te: Rodimus, Cyclonus and Scourge have been captured
by Skorponok for unkno=
wn reasons. Perceptor has tracked to to his last
dig site where he picked u=
p the only two minions who appeared mobile
from this battle: Darkfate and N=
ightstrike.
